name: Jin K. Hong
text: Quite decent food for quite decent price.  Staff was kind and all but it took us a little while longer than expected before food was ready for pick up.  Not a huge place but they have a few tables inside and outside as well for dining in, pretty well maintained.  They were open on Christmas!

name: Troy Campbell
text: Very rude people literally watch them spit on people food and served it to drive threw i will never order ther again

name: Jacob Craighead
text: Only order from here if you like to wait longer than what the wait is supposed to be. I ordered and it said 45 min, then 2 hours and 30 min later the order is delivered. I gave them another shot and ordered a pick up order. Was supposed to be ready in 30 min, I get there 30 min later and its wasn't even in the oven yet.

name: Amy D
text: Great customer service and the pizza is amazingly good! My personal fave pizza is with bacon and pineapple and theirs is to die for, especially with the butter cheese crust! I definitely recommend trying them out!

name: Eric Escobar
text: Not a bad place. Good sandwiches and the staff was cool. Clean and simple.

name: Brandon spencer
text: Omgosh the best pizza in town. There are truley no competitor when it comes to hot fresh quality pizza. Especially with all the crust flavors.

name: Kimberly Sidwell
text: The pizza arrived cold and looking old and slightly burned. We were too hungry to wait for another one after the first hour long delivery wait. We heated it up, and it was okay, but definitely not acceptable quality. I guess you have to pick it up yourself if you want warm food...

name: Brandy Keck
text: Great service, food was fast and really good!

name: From Your Closet Reviews
text: I've always enjoyed coming here on a occassion. The customer service is good and the food is excellent. It's also very close from where I live, so walking up to it is easy.

name: Michael Gargan
text: With the removal of $6 Howie Nowie, their pizza is just over priced for the quality.  I could deal with the mediocre pizza for the low price and the kids liked it, but if I have to spend more money I’m just going to the pizza place up the street for a good pie.
